languages.text: "Никто не ведает грядущего. Всякий анализ обладает погрешностью, и в погрешности этой сокрыт ужас". {n}Грохочущая глубина оставляет вокс Паскаля, возвращая ему привычные шипящие интонации.{/n}

"No one knows the future. Every analysis has its margin of error, and horrors lurk in these margins." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Никто не ведает грядущего. Всякий анализ обладает погрешностью, и в погрешности этой сокрыт ужас". {n}Грохочущая глубина оставляет вокс Паскаля, возвращая ему привычные шипящие интонации.{/n}

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「誰にも未来はわかりません。どんな解析にも誤差範囲というものはあります。そしてホラーはそうした範囲の中に隠れているのです」{n}雷鳴のような深みのある声音がパスカルのヴォクスから聞こえなくなり、代わりに聞き慣れたシューシューという音が聞こえてきた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No one knows the future. Every analysis has its margin of error, and horrors lurk in these margins." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「誰にも未来はわかりません。どんな解析にも誤差範囲というものはあります。そしてホラーはそうした範囲の中に隠れているのです」{n}雷鳴のような深みのある声音がパスカルのヴォクスから聞こえなくなり、代わりに聞き慣れたシューシューという音が聞こえてきた。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “没人知道未来究竟如何。每种分析都有各自的误差，而恐怖的命运就潜藏在这些误差之中。”{n}帕斯卡声音中雷鸣般的低沉声音不见了，他的声音又带上了平时的咝咝声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No one knows the future. Every analysis has its margin of error, and horrors lurk in these margins." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “没人知道未来究竟如何。每种分析都有各自的误差，而恐怖的命运就潜藏在这些误差之中。”{n}帕斯卡声音中雷鸣般的低沉声音不见了，他的声音又带上了平时的咝咝声。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Niemand kennt die Zukunft. Jede Analyse hat Fehlerpotenzial, und darin lauert der Schrecken." {n}Der Unterton der donnernden Tiefgründigkeit schwindet aus Pasqals Vox und weicht seinem üblichen Zischen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No one knows the future. Every analysis has its margin of error, and horrors lurk in these margins." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Niemand kennt die Zukunft. Jede Analyse hat Fehlerpotenzial, und darin lauert der Schrecken." {n}Der Unterton der donnernden Tiefgründigkeit schwindet aus Pasqals Vox und weicht seinem üblichen Zischen.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Personne ne sait ce que l'avenir nous réserve. Toute analyse présente une certaine marge d'erreur, une marge dans laquelle sont tapies bon nombre d'horreurs. » {n}La profondeur habitée qui animait le vox de Pasqal reflue et laisse place à son sifflement coutumier.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No one knows the future. Every analysis has its margin of error, and horrors lurk in these margins." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Personne ne sait ce que l'avenir nous réserve. Toute analyse présente une certaine marge d'erreur, une marge dans laquelle sont tapies bon nombre d'horreurs. » {n}La profondeur habitée qui animait le vox de Pasqal reflue et laisse place à son sifflement coutumier.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Nadie conoce el futuro. Todo análisis presenta un margen de error, y en esos márgenes acechan horrores». {n}El tono de atronadora profundidad abandona la voz de Pasqal, dando paso a su familiar sibilancia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No one knows the future. Every analysis has its margin of error, and horrors lurk in these margins." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Nadie conoce el futuro. Todo análisis presenta un margen de error, y en esos márgenes acechan horrores». {n}El tono de atronadora profundidad abandona la voz de Pasqal, dando paso a su familiar sibilancia.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Geleceği kimse bilemez. Her analizin bir hata payı vardır ve bu hata paylarının içinde dehşetler kol gezer." {n}Pasqal'ın voksundaki gürleyen derinlik yok olup yerini tanıdık bir vızıltıya bırakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No one knows the future. Every analysis has its margin of error, and horrors lurk in these margins." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Geleceği kimse bilemez. Her analizin bir hata payı vardır ve bu hata paylarının içinde dehşetler kol gezer." {n}O gürleyen derinlik Pasqal'ın voksundan kayboluyor, yerini tanıdık bir vızıltıya bırakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
